Test.Name: ptz0: Correct response
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONFIGURTATION OPTIONS test when DUT return correct response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-2-1-3 PTZ CONFIGURATION OPTIONS
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetConfigurations response STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Validating PTZ configuration options STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: Wrong response: no PTZConfiguration
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONFIGURTATION OPTIONS test when DUT return Wrong response: no PTZConfiguration.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-2-1-3 PTZ CONFIGURATION OPTIONS
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetConfigurations response should return at least one PTZ configuration STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Wrong response: Timeout max less than min
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONFIGURTATION OPTIONS test when DUT return Wrong response: Timeout max less than min.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-2-1-3 PTZ CONFIGURATION OPTIONS
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetConfigurations response STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Validating PTZ configuration options PTZ configuration options contains invalid timeout range. Max value (PT0.05S) is less than min value (PT0.06S) STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Wrong response: wrong format Timeout max
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONFIGURTATION OPTIONS test when DUT return Wrong response: wrong format Timeout max.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-2-1-3 PTZ CONFIGURATION OPTIONS
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetConfigurations response STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done The 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema:Max' element is invalid - The value 'WRONG' is invalid according to its datatype 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:duration' - The string 'WRONG' is not a valid Duration value. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Wrong response: wrong format Timeout min
Test.Description: Check PTZ CONFIGURTATION OPTIONS test when DUT return Wrong response: wrong format Timeout min.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-2-1-3 PTZ CONFIGURATION OPTIONS
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetConfigurations response STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done The 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema:Min' element is invalid - The value 'WRONG' is invalid according to its datatype 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:duration' - The string 'WRONG' is not a valid Duration value. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
